article_title: Government Mandates, Like Obamacare, Mean A $7.25 Minimum Wage Is Effectively $10.46

article_metadata.description: Due to Obamacare and other mandates, today's minimum wage of $7.25 effectively amounts to $10.46 an hour. Raising the minimum wage to $15 hourly effectively would require employers to pay $18.31 to their least skilled workers. This will have devastating unemployment consequences for black teens in particular.
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary
